Useful Identities¶

Trigonometry¶

\[\begin{split}\begin{aligned} \mathbf{a} \times \left(\mathbf{b} \times \mathbf{c}\right) &= \mathbf{b}\left(\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{c}\right) - \mathbf{c}\left(\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{b}\right) \\ \left(\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}\right) \times \mathbf{c} &= -\mathbf{a}\left(\mathbf{b} \cdot \mathbf{c}\right) + \mathbf{b} \left(\mathbf{a} \cdot \mathbf{c}\right) \\ \mathbf{a} \cdot \left(\mathbf{b} \times \mathbf{c}\right) &= \left(\mathbf{a} \times \mathbf{b}\right) \cdot \mathbf{c} \\ \end{aligned}\end{split}\]

Convolution¶

\[\begin{split}\begin{aligned} (f \star g)(t) &= \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} f(\tau) g(t-\tau) d\tau \\ &= \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} f(t-\tau) g(\tau) d\tau \end{aligned}\end{split}\]
